Module CODEX
Package CODEX.org.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
CODEX.utils.Observable
CODEX.org.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Observable implements Serializable
This class represents a player in a game
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player()
      Class constructor this method would be called if the player is created before locating a Game instance

  • Method Details

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(PlayableCard card) throws CardNotDrawableException
      This method draws a card and if there's an association between game and player then modifies the market, whilst if it has been used introduces another card in the player's deck
      Parameters:
      card - is the card that the player has taken from a deck or from the market
      Throws:
      CardNotDrawableException - if the player is trying to draw a not drawable card

    • playCard

      public void playCard(PlayableCard card, Coordinates position, boolean orientation) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method plays a card and removes it from playerDeck
      Parameters:
      card - the card the player wants to place on his board
      position - of the card (decided by the player himself)
      orientation - of the card (decided by the player himself)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • playBaseCard

      public void playBaseCard(boolean orientation, PlayableCard card)
      This method sets base card orientation and places it
      Parameters:
      orientation - of the card (decided by the player himself)
      card - it's the first base card

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints(int points)
      This method adds the points to the player
      Parameters:
      points - points to add to the player

    • addNumObjectivesReached

      public void addNumObjectivesReached()
      This method adds the number of objective reached by the player (+1)

    • addPersonalObjective

      public void addPersonalObjective(ObjectiveCard card)
      This method adds an objective card to the list. The list will contain 2 random objective cards and the player will need to select only one of them
      Parameters:
      card - is the objective card you need to add to the list

    • setColor

      public void setColor(Pawn color)
      Setter method
      Parameters:
      color - is the one chosen by player

    • setGame

      public void setGame(Game game)
      Setter method
      Parameters:
      game - where the player is

    • setIsFirst

      public void setIsFirst(boolean isFirst)
      Setter method
      Parameters:
      isFirst - says if the player is the first one in each round or not

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(String nickname)
      Setter method
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player

    • setPersonalObjective

      public void setPersonalObjective(ObjectiveCard card) throws CardNotOwnedException
      Setter method
      Parameters:
      card - is the personal objective chosen by the player
      Throws:
      CardNotOwnedException - if the card is not owned by the players who is trying to select it

      public PlayableCard getPlayerDeck(int index)
      Getter method

      Returns:
